Name: f500-2017-rank
Description: Rank of the company on the 2017 Fortune 500

Name: name
Description: Name of the company as it appears on the Fortune 500 list
Examples: Wal-Mart Stores, Berkshire Hathaway, Apple, etc

Name: data-avail
Description: Indicates whether the company publicly releases full employee diversity data (full data means it matches EEO-1 form fields), partial data, or no data

Name: data-url
Description: The link to the site where the diversity data can be found online

Name: diversity-pg-url
Description: The link to the webpage where the company has a commitment to diversity and/or inclusion or an equal opportunity employment statement

Name: data-year
Description: The year for which diversity data is available for the company, "n/a" if no data is publicly available

Name: PAYROLL_START
Description: Date marking the beginning of the payroll period in which the data was collected, "n/a" if no data is publicly available

Name: PAYROLL_END
Description: Date marking the end of the payroll period in which the data was collected, "n/a" if no data is publicly available
